alert.note: Alert for Clinton; Jackson; Scott (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 25 at 7:26PM CST until November 26 at 12:00PM CST by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO NOON CST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches. * WHERE...Portions of north central, northwest and west central Illinois and east central Iowa. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to noon CST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The first accumulating snow event of the season can often cause travel problems as people adjust to the poor driving conditions. Allow extra travel time and use caution.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
